title: play button disappears
body:
the client has been behaving weirdly recently.the play button disappears sometimes and comes back sometimes..this keeps happening but most of the time it takes too long to come back.it says"we cant create the lobby right now"
this is what I mean
https://ibb.co/drjCBG
plz help me solve this

replies.body: Thanks for the screenshot!  The client is connecting you to different services, in this case it seems some network instability is knocking you off the matchmaking service.  Try the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to look into clearing this up.
